Uses of Package
it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel

  • Classes in it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel used by it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel 
    Class and Description
    Datastream
    Definition: A datastream groups a collection of observations that are related in some way.
    FeatureOfInterest
    Definition: Features or feature collections that represent the identifiable object(s) on which the sensor systems are making observations.
    Location
    Definition: A location is an absolute geographical position at a specific time point.
    Observation
    Definition: An act of observing a property or phenomenon on a feature of interest, with the goal of producing an estimate of the value of the property.
    ObservedProperty
    Definition: An observedProperty specifies the phenomenon of an observation.
    Sensor
    Definition: A sensor is an instrument that can observe a property or phenomenon with the goal of producing an estimate of the value of the property.
    Thing
    Thing class.
